dt: {bc}the place or position in which something or someone stands or is assigned to stand or remain
{bc}any of the places in a manufacturing operation at which one part of the work is done
{bc}equipment used usually by one person for performing a particular job
{bc}a regular stopping place in a transportation route
{bc}the building connected with such a stopping place {bc}{sx|depot||3}
{bc}a post or sphere of duty or occupation
{bc}a stock farm or ranch especially of Australia or New Zealand
{bc}a place for specialized observation and study of scientific phenomena
{bc}a place established to provide a public service: such as
{bc}a complete assemblage of radio or television equipment for transmitting or receiving
{bc}the place in which such a station is located

et: Middle English {it}stacioun{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}estation, statiun{/it}, from Latin {it}station-, statio{/it}, from {it}stare{/it} to stand {ma}{mat|stand|}{/ma}
shortdef: the place or position in which something or someone stands or is assigned to stand or remain
any of the places in a manufacturing operation at which one part of the work is done
equipment used usually by one person for performing a particular job

dt: {bc}to assign to or set in a station or position {bc}{sx|post:7||}

shortdef: to assign to or set in a station or position : post

dt: {bc}a pause in a radio or television broadcast for announcement of the identity of the network or station
{bc}an announcement or advertisement during this pause

shortdef: a pause in a radio or television broadcast for announcement of the identity of the network or station; also : an announcement or advertisement during this pause

dt: {bc}a house at a post or station

shortdef: a house at a post or station; especially : police station

dt: {bc}an automobile that has a passenger compartment which extends to the back of the vehicle, that has no trunk, that has one or more rear seats which can be folded down to make space for light cargo, and that has a tailgate or liftgate

shortdef: an automobile that has a passenger compartment which extends to the back of the vehicle, that has no trunk, that has one or more rear seats which can be folded down to make space for light cargo, and that has a tailgate or liftgate

dt: {bc}one used primarily for receiving and transmitting television signals

shortdef: dish; especially : one used primarily for receiving and transmitting television signals

dt: {bc}an establishment for scientific research (as in agriculture) where experiments are carried out, studies of practical application are made, and information is disseminated

shortdef: an establishment for scientific research (as in agriculture) where experiments are carried out, studies of practical application are made, and information is disseminated

dt: {bc}a building housing fire apparatus and usually firefighters

shortdef: a building housing fire apparatus and usually firefighters
